body.description: THE BEST RAPID DISSOLVING TISSUE PAPER 8 ROLLS 2 PLY 500 SHEETS No more Hassle- Relax and enjoy Your Outdoor experience. Tired of wasting hours dealing with filthy septic tanks & smelly toilets? Well, grab these Rapid-dissolving Tissues & transform your outdoor experience! Our unique & sophisticated design ensures these tissues will dissolve immediately after use. Getting our Toilet papers ensures you will need not deal with nasty chemicals, enzymes, chlorine tablets, bacteria & other nauseating cleaner solutions that are usually recommended for your septic tank or toilet. We ensure our Tissue Paper rolls are Septic Tank and Chemical Toilet Safe. Now you can sit back, relax & enjoy quality time with your family and friends without worrying over blocked toilets. Quality - Get value for your money With a soft, strong & gently textured design, our tissue papers will not rip or tear unexpectedly. What's more, wave ensured these tissues can be used without being abrasive or uncomfortable. We ONLY deliver the BEST. Our Tissues for Septic Tanks are also fully biodegradable & safe on the environment. Get yours & contribute to environmental conservationing in a 4-roll pack each having 500 sheets, you will save more. You can also grab our amazing vouchers & pay even less! Carry for all your outdoor adventures Looking to add top quality supplies for your next outdoor escapade? Then you have to add our Septic Tank Safe Toilet Tissue to your list. Get these tissue rolls for your RVs, tiny houses, off-grid living, boats, yachts or composing toilet. You'll be glad you did. You can also carry them when camping or hiking. Why Wait? Click Add to Cart now & Grab the BEST Toilet Tissues in the Market!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it's supposed to
reviews.reviewText: Serves it's purpose and isn't too expensive. Will purchase again as needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: What can I say about camping toilet paper. This stuff is great for not plugging up your camper holding tanks. It is thin and not the thickness you are going to get out of your home toilet paper but it works great in the camper. I like that it breaks down nicely so as not to plug up the camper black tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like it. It makes a lot of sense that it won't clog your toilet because any moisture makes it start to just breakdown. That includes in and on you. My Nederlands don't need anything extra. So I wouldn't want to use this tissue ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RV toilet paper.
reviews.reviewText: This was a good value for your money. It just necessary to use the right toilet paper. When you have an RV otherwise it clogs everything up. This does not do that as it is specifically made for R VS.This is the product we use most.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dissolves easily in RV onboard flush toilet
reviews.reviewText: To be able to dissolve easily, it is necessarily THIN. You have to make a balance between feeling like silk or clogging your system. The toilet paper is not a rough texture, but you might need to use a couple of more squares per 'application' than your regular home tissue, to ensure it doesn't tear during vigorous use.
Used in the RV park to lessen stree on septic system
Ce papier se déchire ailleurs que sur les pointillés. Peu absorbant. Trop cher pour la qualité d'usage.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's TP - what do I say ?
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all.This is RV TP so it will NOT be the softest or most absorbent, but that's the point.Trying not to spit on the earth anymore than necessary !!
It’s great for trailer use. It is no more absorbent or more sturdy than typical septic tank friendly papers.
